head.title: World Briefing | Asia: Pakistan: Chief Judge Challenges His Judges

hedline.hl1: World Briefing | Asia: Pakistan: Chief Judge Challenges His Judges

block.p: Iftikhar Mohammad Chaudhry, the chief justice suspended by President Pervez Musharraf last month, appeared before the Supreme Judicial Council to defend himself on charges of misuse of power. He has filed a petition in the Supreme Court, the court he once headed, challenging the constitutional authority of the five-judge council, said his lawyer, Chaudhry Aitzaz Ahsan. The council adjourned the hearing until Tuesday.
